nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 3am. Mostly cloudy. Low around -12, with temperatures rising to around 7 overnight. Wind chill values as low as -20. South wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 32. Southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Cloudy. Low around 22, with temperatures rising to around 25 overnight. West wind 6 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Friday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 31. Northwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow after midnight. Cloudy, with a low around 6. North wind 6 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 13. Northeast wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around -7. East wind around 7 mph.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 14. Southeast wind 6 to 10 mph.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 6. South wind around 10 mph.

nws.name: Monday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Partly Sunny
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before noon. Partly sunny, with a high near 34. Southwest wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 20. West wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before noon, then a chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 35. Southwest wind 8 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 16. West wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 26.
